title.title: Title
title.helpText: User friendly title. E.g. Red tomatoes.

name.title: Name
name.helpText: Plain name of product, should not include unit.

grossPrice.title: Gross Price
grossPrice.helpText: Gross price of product, including VAT.

unitQuantity.title: Unit Quantity
unitQuantity.helpText: Amount in selected unit type. E.g. 2 if 2 kg.

unit.helpText: What sort of unit is this?

ingredients.title: Ingredients
ingredients.helpText: Specify ingredients seperated by a comma. E.g. milk, egg, sugar.

allergens.title: Allergens
allergens.helpText: Specify allergens seperated by a comma. E.g. milk, egg, sugar.

name.helpText: Plain name of product, should not include unit.

grossPrice.helpText: Gross price of product, including VAT.

unitQuantity.title: Unit Quantity
unitQuantity.helpText: Amount in selected unit type. E.g. 2 if 2 kg.

unit.helpText: What sort of unit is this?

gtin.title: Gtin
gtin.helpText: Global trade item number. Number bellow barcode.

isAvailable.title: Is Available
isAvailable.helpText: Product is available and is actively used in recipes.

isSynced.title: Is Synced
isSynced.helpText: Product is synced with external providers

searchKeywords.title: Search Keywords
searchKeywords.helpText: Separate with spaces. Title is included by default.

externalUrl.title: External Url
externalUrl.helpText: Direct link to the recipe on a provider's site

isVegetarian.title: Is Vegetarian
isVegetarian.helpText: The recipe does not conatin any meat or fish products.
